fields.name: CosmosDbAccountResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Cosmos DB account used to create the data connection.

fields.name: CosmosDbContainer
fields.description: The name of an existing container in the Cosmos DB database.

fields.name: CosmosDbDatabase
fields.description: The name of an existing database in the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: ManagedIdentityObjectId
fields.description: The object ID of the managed identity resource.

fields.name: ManagedIdentityResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of a managed system or user-assigned identity. The identity is used to authenticate with Cosmos DB.

fields.name: MappingRuleName
fields.description: The name of an existing mapping rule to use when ingesting the retrieved data.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

fields.name: RetrievalStartDate
fields.description: Optional. If defined, the data connection retrieves Cosmos DB documents created or updated after the specified retrieval start date.

fields.name: TableName
fields.description: The case-sensitive name of the existing target table in your cluster. Retrieved data is ingested into this table.
